nodes.bodyText: Maybe add a "Hallowed Sepulchre" config section since "Projectile Color" on its own doesn't really mean anything in this plugin, and having four sepulchre configs is starting to get a bit busy at the bottom of this config.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -234,12 +234,34 @@ default boolean highlightSepulchreNpcs()
 
 	@ConfigItem(
 		keyName = "sepulchreHighlightColor",
-		name = "Sepulchre Highlight",
+		name = "Projectile Color",

nodes.bodyText: By adding the config section, it makes "Sepulchre" redundant in the config names, so those can probably be removed. Thoughts?
